About the Game

‚îÄ‚îÄSomehow everything around you felt unfamiliar.
‚ÄúIndecent male dog should speak honestly~‚Äù the beautiful master trampled me on the ground and looked down at me.

‚óÜFeatured Systems

‚óáFull CG mode can be turned on in the environment setting, and HCG can be freely browsed.

‚óáPressure-Free Operation Support one-click mouse operation-Fast text-to-text system

‚óÜStory

Master said that I‚Äôm full of sexual desire
If I want to cure my perverted behavior, I should wear the chastity sheath
‚ÄúEven the chastity sheath can‚Äôt cure you‚Ä¶ seems that you need to be trained hard."

I had always been a very horny guy. I would think about H things all day that my master called me a male dog on heat‚Ä¶
But then I suddenly wanted to cure my perverted behavior
Could I succeed?

However, along with the training progress, I felt like I became more horny
Was that normal? Was she‚Ä¶ really my master?

‚óÜHow to Play

The main gameplay is to live with your beautiful ‚Äúmaster‚Äù. Along with the storyline development, the ‚Äúmaster‚Äù would train you with various S&M methods.
Your choices will bring you to different endings.

This game has many unique H events.
Along with the game progress, you may unlock various H positions.
There are even fantastic potion training and magical transformation.

But in your sweet sexual life, you slightly felt indisposed.
If you insisted on leaving, you would face the irreversible physical training.

Would you choose your downfall or try to escape that small house?

‚óÜGame Characteristic

‚óá16 Basic CG, Including More Than 200 Different Pictures

‚óáGame Text: 50.000 words
‚óáTraining M Game
‚óáGame EndingÔºö5 Types

data.short_description: You and a beautiful witch lived in a small house amongst the forest, living a life full of sex every day, but if you didn‚Äôt listen to her, you would probably get trained cruelly.
data.supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese*, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Korean, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, drug abuse, self-harm, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.
